snippet: COHEN--Sherman. 1/22/2013. Not a day has gone by over the past three years that I have not missed your wisdom, your guidance, and, your smile. You continue to inspire me as a mentor and I always hear and heed your good advice. You are forever with me as my father and my best friend. With devotion and much love, Charles 1/3
